branchCategory.name: LVR, High Purity Regulator Valve, Integral Fitting
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's high purity liquid regulator, series LVR, offers superior performance in both pulsation dampening, as well as adjustable liquid flow control.  The LVR series is capable of 110° C operating temperature, which meets many of today's most demanding requirements.  LVR is available with SMC's new LQ3 HyperFlareâ„¢ connection.</P>
